physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a crowded road with a body of water to the left. There are a couple of pedestrians and a cyclist on that road
 together with numerous cars
 jeeps
 and trucks. Some of the vehicles are moving while others are parked. Several small boats are in operation and people can be seen rowing on these boats. In the background towards the left
 a roofed building serves as bridge
 connecting the road to the body of water.

metadata.title_text: Vehicles on the streets and boats on the water Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a crowded road with a body of water to the left. There are a couple of pedestrians and a cyclist on that road, together with numerous cars, jeeps, and trucks. Some of the vehicles are moving while others are parked. Several small boats are in operation and people can be seen rowing on these boats. In the background towards the left, a roofed building serves as bridge, connecting the road to the body of water.
metadata.subject_terms_1: street scenes bodies of water (natural) land vehicles boats
metadata.subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Bodies of water Vehicles Boats and boating
